01 of 08 Yara Shahidi's Brand-New Bedroom Dustin Walker for Laurel & Wolf Yara Shahidi is not your average 17-year-old — she stars in ABC's Black-ish, advocates for girls' rights, and is an academic all-star — but just like any other teen, her bedroom is her sanctuary. "My room is really the center of how I run my personal empire," she says. "It's the center of it — kingdom and castle." But also similar to her peers, her space was lacking sophisticated design direction. "I had a few things taped on the wall and I had a lot of pieces that weren't very coordinated," she says. With a little guidance from online interior design service Laurel & Wolf and PBteen, she was able to transform her mismatched corner of the world into a free-spirited space where she can work, learn and grow. "It was a room just to basically go to sleep in and then wake up and do other things in," she says. "But now, I can live in my room."

02 of 08 Cool and Collected Dustin Walker for Laurel & Wolf "I've always viewed my room like a visual view of my brain," Shahidi says. "You can tell when I'm frazzled, my room is frazzled. When I have my life together, my room is perfect." Her newly decorated retreat is ready for its close-up here, boasting a colorful new quilt, a bright-white desk and quirky table lamps from PBTeen to better capture the young actress's personality.

03 of 08 Shelf Help Dustin Walker for Laurel & Wolf One must-have for the young star was storage for her many knick-knacks. A gold pinboard and traditional bookshelves offer plenty of spots to display her stuff. "I can now be more intentional about what's lying around," she says.

04 of 08 Meaningful Collections Dustin Walker for Laurel & Wolf "I have my cameras on display. I feel like that it's a key part of who I am," she says of the collection that sits atop a stack of books. "Looking around my room you'll see how many hobbies and how many interests I have just from the books alone," she says, adding that they "range from one on Pharrell Williams to James Baldwin essays to a Vonnegut encyclopedia, which is my favorite thing."

05 of 08 Old Meets New Dustin Walker for Laurel & Wolf A storage desk serves as the perfect perch for Shahidi's favorite old-timey finds. "I collect antiques — I have a typewriter, a record player and an old-school pencil sharpener," she says. "I like the fact that it kind of pays homage to my love of history."

06 of 08 Pretty Palette Dustin Walker for Laurel & Wolf Shades of blue and purple enliven the crisp, white space, while details like a pom-pom pillow cover exude a youthful charm. "I'm such a vivid person and I wanted my space to match that," she says.

07 of 08 Safe Space Dustin Walker for Laurel & Wolf Shahidi recently announced she's deferring college for at least a year, "to have a moment to just focus on work and creative ideas and really figure out what I want to set up and plan for myself for the next few years to come." And she feels her bedroom serves as a haven for her to make those decisions. "It's exactly what I needed," she says. "I can choose whether I want to listen to music and get some work done or have a mini dance party or whatever it might be."
